post.author: Daldopayaso
post.body:
hey guys, hope to get some help from you, i recentky instaled doom 3 on my new pc, and installed doom but evey time i start a new game the game goes to the "loading" screen and then inmediatly goes back to the menu... any ideas how can i solve this??

my machine...
Intel core 2 duo
3Gigs Ram
Nvidia 9600 gt
SoundBlaster Audigy ZS
Plenty of free space...

Thanks, Any help would be great.
Daldo.

post.author: Kristus
post.body: Check the console. (ctrl+alt+tilde) For some reason it fails to load the first map.

post.author: Daldopayaso
post.body:
Thanks man, that worked wonders. only opened the console and it worked, didnt have to do anything... i think my dvd may me to scrachty, anyways thanks, off to playing

Daldo

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body: Opened the console solved the problem?!?

post.author: evilartist
post.body:
Daldopayaso wrote:
Thanks man, that worked wonders. only opened the console and it worked, didnt have to do anything... i think my dvd may me to scrachty, anyways thanks, off to playing

Daldo

I'm not quite sure how you got a new game to start just by opening the console. What Kristus meant is that the console should display the specific error message that keeps the marscity map from running.
